snippet: A former New England Mafia boss was sentenced to 5 ½ years in prison on Friday for his role in the shakedown of Providence strip clubs.
abstract: Luigi 'Baby Shacks' Manocchio, former New England Mafia boss, is sentenced to five and a half years in prison for his role in the shakedown of Providence, RI, strip clubs.
lead_paragraph: A former New England Mafia boss was sentenced to 5 ½ years in prison on Friday for his role in the shakedown of Providence strip clubs.

headline.seo: Rhode Island: Former Mob Boss Gets 5 1/2 Years
headline.main: Rhode Island: Former Mob Boss Gets 5 ½ Years
headline.print_headline: Rhode Island: Former Mob Boss Gets 5 ½ Years
